column4: thanks cwillu, it is just when i open a page containing titles and movies, the both of them are replaced by grey squares containing a 'play' symbol. if i click on the play symbol on the place where the title should be, it shows the title. If i click on the play symbol that replaced the movie, i see the first frame and then nothing else happens
run locate libflashsupport.so and let me know if you see a line /usr/lib/mozilla/....
if not in plugins please run sudo update-alterntives --config firefox-flashplugin
yeah its not the right name give me a minute ill get the right name
yup firefox 3.0b5, i even tried installing internet explorer 6 to see if i could resolve it like that, but in IE it is not working either
if you go to tools>addons from firefox menu do you see the flashblock extension listed
disable it restart ff and try again
after browser restart does it work?
